data.message: I understand that Facebook is free, and I appreciate that, but when a person uses the paid features, and they are charged for seemingly NO reason, weeks after their campaigns have ended, it becomes VERY frustrating when trying to resolve this as there is no customer service to speak of. I've spent quite a bit of time and money on this already. It's not even my product, yet my personal PayPal has been charged. This is ridiculous. I need my money back that no one had permission to take. I would've taken my Paypal info off, but of course, that's is ridiculously annoying to do also. Let's see if Facebook actually cares enough to reply. Because I've sure tried MANY times to get in touch, with NO luck...

replies.message: We're sorry to hear you're experiencing this, Ashlie. If you see a Facebook charge on your bank statement that you don't recognize, please report it to us by filling out this form: http://bit.ly/2rUNs35. -Jessica
